Home.intro: Hey! Welcome to my site - I'm Joanna. A frontend developer who writes, does creative stuff, and tries to find the balance between mom life and a hundred new ideas per minute. Here you'll find a collection of all my projects and initiatives. Make yourself at home! ğŸ§¡

aboutMe.title: A few words about me...
aboutMe.part_1: I look for excuses to ponder and converse
aboutMe.part_2: I create s podcast and a newsletter
aboutMe.part_3: I advocate for growing at your own pace and in your own way
aboutMe.part_4: I operate in the spirit of lifelong learning, essentialism, and deep work
aboutMe.part_5: I show how new tech can help us in everyday life
aboutMe.part_7: I inspire others with my contagious enthusiasm and drive for action

aboutWork.title: A few words about how I work...
aboutWork.part_2: I mainly work in: JavaScript, TypeScript & React
aboutWork.part_3: I share knowledge at conferences, lectures, and workshops
aboutWork.part_4: I have experience in maintaining legacy projects, migrating to newer technologies, and building functionalities from scratch.
aboutWork.part_5: I am a strong advocate of thorough application testing
aboutWork.part_6: I believe that a key ingredient of team work is good communication

newsletter.title: Newsletter "Pretekst do rozmyÅ›laÅ„"
newsletter.description: Name translates to: "A Pretext for Reflection". I write about personal development, creativity, and technology. I share my thoughts, experiences, and inspirations. I recommend books, podcasts, and tools that help me grow. A new issue every two weeks in your mailbox. Join today ğŸ’Œ! For now newsletter is available only in Polish

podcast.title: Podcast "Pod Pretekstem"
podcast.description: Name translates to "On the Pretext". Join me in searching for pretexts to reflect and converse. The topics we'll explore include coding, well-being, balance, motherhood, notes, development, planning, and rest. But really, anything can be a pretext for reflection. Listen on your favorite podcast platform or on YouTube ğŸ§ For now podcast is available only in Polish

blog.title: Blog wakeupandcode.pl
blog.description: A collection of articles about changing industries, learning coding, and taking the first steps in IT. Additionally life musings, reviews of interesting content and huge doses of motivation to act ğŸŒ± Available only in Polish but feel free to translate and enjoy the content
